channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Necromancer and Revenant (Tweaked for Balancing)
channel.description:
**Necromancer**
**Class Type:** Neutral Killer
**Passive: Dark Magic**: Uses a soul to be Night immune if attacked
. .
**Night Ability 1**: (Infinite, up to 2 souls, a two night cooldown)
**Soul Catch**: Kills someone to catch their soul (Adds one to the Living Dead)
**Night Ability 2**: (0 use)
**The Living Dead**: Select a Dead Player to revive into a Revenant (Would appear to be a Death Knight)
**Goal**: Survive until the end of everyone else died (Can win with the Revenants. Can win with Neutral King) . .
**Revenant**
**Class Type**: Neutral Social
**Passive**: Rotting - Dies 3 nights after being infected
. . **Night Ability 1**: (Infinite. One night cooldown)
**Bite:** Bites another person to become a Revenant (Can't convert unconvertable, Special, Unseen/Cult. Can't Convert the Necromancer. Can convert every other Neutral.)
. .
**Goal**: Win with other Revenants resulting in Revenants win (Can win if died. Neutral King must die. Can win with Dark Court Wizard) . . **Thanks to Weizen1988 for coming up the name Revenant and suggest ideas of raising the dead into Revenant**
